title: Fry Me to the Moon
overview: Lu Zhenzhen, who took his career very seriously, risked his own life and returned to Chengdu for love. Her best friend Gu Manting, who married her childhood sweetheart early but always wanted to escape from the marriage, invited Zhenzhen to join her time-honored hotel "Sichuan Bailou". The original life trajectory of the two was broken by the sudden appearance of catering entrepreneur Liang Qingran... The sudden crisis in Sichuan Bailou made three women with different personalities "unable to get acquainted without fighting." After many tests of love, career, and ideals, what choices will they make in the fireworks of Chengdu?
